toggle-toggle.switch.sneak.toggle: Sneak mode is now set to Toggle
toggle-toggle.switch.sprint.hold: Sprint mode is now set to Hold
toggle-toggle.switch.sprint.toggle: Sprint mode is now set to Toggle
